remarks: Prove a property of polynomials by "structural" induction, under a simplified model of structure which loses the sum of products structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
pf1ind.cb $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
pf1ind.cp $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
pf1ind.ct $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
pf1ind.cq $e |- Q = ran ( eval1 ` R ) $.
pf1ind.ad $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( ( f e. Q /\ ta ) /\ ( g e. Q /\ et ) ) ) -> ze ) $.
pf1ind.mu $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( ( f e. Q /\ ta ) /\ ( g e. Q /\ et ) ) ) -> si ) $.
pf1ind.wa $e |- ( x = ( B X. { f } ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
pf1ind.wb $e |- ( x = ( _I |` B ) -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
pf1ind.wc $e |- ( x = f -> ( ps <-> ta ) ) $.
pf1ind.wd $e |- ( x = g -> ( ps <-> et ) ) $.
pf1ind.we $e |- ( x = ( f oF .+ g ) -> ( ps <-> ze ) ) $.
pf1ind.wf $e |- ( x = ( f oF .x. g ) -> ( ps <-> si ) ) $.
pf1ind.wg $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> rh ) ) $.
pf1ind.co $e |- ( ( ph /\ f e. B ) -> ch ) $.
pf1ind.pr $e |- ( ph -> th ) $.
pf1ind.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Q ) $.
pf1ind $p |- ( ph -> rh ) $.
$d .+ f g x $.
$d .x. f g x $.
$d A x $.
$d B f g x $.
$d Q f g $.
$d ch x $.
$d et f x $.
$d f g ph $.
$d f g ps $.
$d rh x $.
$d si x $.
$d ta x $.
$d th x $.
$d x ze $.
